event.description: We are reusing a 'websites' topic and the messages are differentiated by 'event'

deploy_id.description: An ID that events can be grouped on

deploy_timestamp.description: Used to know if messages after repo-push-begin are out of order

domain.description: The website domain. Required for repo-push-[begin/success]

cms_urn.description: When multi-domain, it's the website_urn. When single-domain, it's the client.website.urn

owner_urn.description: The website's owner URN. It's either a client_urn or location_urn. Required for repo-push-[begin/success]

cms_repo_dir.description: The location of the CMS repo-dir. This directory automatically gets deleted by a nightly job. Present in steps after repo-push-begin

gcs_cp_command.description: The Google Cloud Storage command executed to copy the contents of 'cms_repo_dir' to GCS. Present in steps after repo-push-success

error_message.description: Description of error, Present when error

error_backtrace.description: Backtrace of error, Present when error

info_message.description: Free form text for providing information about the message

error_on_event.description: where the error occurred. Present when error

linked_domains.description: Domains linked from website-provisioner. Should be present from domain-provision-success
